response.overview: Set in Uttarakhand; Pushkar, a postman in mid 30s finds an undelivered letter written 7 years ago. With the objective of delivering the letter to its intended recipient, he gets on his personal quest in pursuit of answers.
response.tagline: Set in Uttarakhand; Pushkar, a postman in mid 30s finds an undelivered letter written 7 years ago. With the objective of delivering the letter to its intended recipient, he gets on his personal quest in pursuit of answers.
response.title: Raibaar
